name: Roll of the Mice
description:
Roll of the Mice is a maths-based puzzle game where you play as a little mouse! You can push dice around, and by doing so, change the number on top of each die. You must then complete/solve the mathematical formulae with these numbers, so be careful you have the right orientation!

This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022! I had a great time making it, and I'm working towards getting a devlog video out shortly :)

All code, art, and music assets were made during the time of this jam period. I even have each text file as a separate images from hand-writing them 😅

Thank you for playing! :D
